abstractText: In the first paragraph of the Introduction in the paper by Yamashita et al. (2022), the sentence ‘The low hydrate-forming capability of KCl can be ascribed to the energetic disadvantages of hydration, as seen in its negative enthalpy of dissolution’ is corrected to ‘The low hydrate-forming capability of KCl can be ascribed to the energetic disadvantages of hydration, as seen in its endothermic dissolution’; the updated phrase is highlighted in bold.

In the paper by Yamashita et al. [Acta Cryst. (2022), C78, 749–754], an incorrect phrase is updated.
In the first paragraph of the Introduction in the paper by Yamashita et al. (2022), the sentence ‘The low hydrate-forming capability of KCl can be ascribed to the energetic disadvantages of hydration, as seen in its negative enthalpy of dissolution’ is corrected to ‘The low hydrate-forming capability of KCl can be ascribed to the energetic disadvantages of hydration, as seen in its endothermic dissolution’; the updated phrase is highlighted in bold.
